entry.title: WIND WARNING , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 8.2°C
Wind: SW 46 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
